item.description:
EVENT THE DETAILS
When
Oct. 14th
7:00 PM - 9:30 PM
Where
The Precinct
70 Union Square
Somerville, MA 02143
Cost
$20 (doorcharge); $250 (Private cocktails with the writers & artists)Obama-thon
Obama supporters rally for an evening of readings, music, art, and more to raise money for the campaign. Renowned authors, like Steve Almond, Anita Diamant, Joe Finder, Jennifer Haigh, Pagan Kennedy, Gail Mazur, Stephen McCauley, Claire Messud, and Robert Pinsky will give short, politically charged readings, and guests can bid on art by Gerry Bergstein, Ellen Driscoll, Michael Mazur, Rosamond Purcell, and Raphael Soyer. All procedes from the Obama-thon will go to the Obama/Biden campaign.

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: 911 Truth for Bigwig Obama supporters at Fundraiser
